# Compiler to use
CXX = g++

# Compiler flags: -Wall (all warnings), -Wextra (extra warnings), -std=c++11 (C++ standard)
CXXFLAGS = -Wall -Wextra -std=c++11

# Target executable name
TARGET = tictactoe

# List of source files
SRCS = main.cpp

# Default rule: build the target
all: $(TARGET)

# Rule to build the target from the source file(s)
$(TARGET): $(SRCS)
	$(CXX) $(CXXFLAGS) $(SRCS) -o $(TARGET)

# Clean rule to remove generated files (like the executable)
clean:
	rm -f $(TARGET)

# Phony targets ensure make doesn't confuse them with file names
.PHONY: all clean
